Hey there! 👋🏻  I'm Kavir

I’m a senior product manager and startup advisor, currently in Toronto, originally from Mumbai. Have 8+ years of product and founder experience. ISB and On Deck alum. I enjoy tech, football, gaming (FIFA), standup comedy, and exploring new places to eat good food.

Work

I do the following:

  • 💼 previously: product manager at CarDekho (Sequoia and CapitalG backed) and ex-founder
